Articles.Content: Hey I ran the launcher and found the option. However it also had x64 checked as well. I play with steam and its apparent to me that the launcher configs have no affect on the steam version? Does AMD compatiblity mode work with steam(When activated thru the launcher)? If so, why has my game been running in 32 bit and not 64 despite what the launcher says. Any help would be much appreciated i'm trying to get my as optimized as possible, thanks!
